# subscript(dynamicMember:)

**Instance Subscript**

Facilitates accessing product properties on an option value.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript<T>(dynamicMember keyPath: KeyPath<Product, T>) -> T { get }
```

## Discussion

You don’t use this subscript directly. Instead, access the properties of a [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product] instance directly on a [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/Option] value. For an example of using a dynamic member lookup, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/Option].

## Looking up dynamic members

- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Facilitates accessing optional subscription properties on an option value.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Facilitates accessing subscription properties on an option value.
